https://image.tmdb.org/t/p/w500/wAYT22NgucfVwQ1tkwkCDSMAmP8.jpg After being taunted at a coffee shop, a timid young man enlists his two best friends to help him track his newfound bully down and put him in his place. They do just that, but misguided machismo then fuels an ensuing battle of wills. Bad, Bad Men
